Searches.name: divSent
Searches.label: Emailed
Searches.divMainStyle: display: flex;margin: 5px auto;margin-left: 0px;margin-right: 25px;flex-direction: column;border: solid rgb(48, 178, 74) 0px;text-align: center;color: #0a58ca;font-weight: bold;font-size: 18px;
Searches.divSearchStyle: display: flex;margin: 5px auto;justify-content: center;border: solid rgb(0, 0, 0) 0px

inputs.name: btnSentTrue
inputs.label: Yes
inputs.style: display: flex;margin: auto;margin-right: 5px;font-size: 18px;background-color: green;color: white;border: solid black 1px;border-radius: 5px
inputs.tooltip: Select all applications that have been sent.

inputs.name: btnSentFalse
inputs.label: No
inputs.style: display: flex;margin: auto;font-size: 18px;background-color: red;color: white;border: solid black 1px;border-radius: 5px
inputs.tooltip: Select all applications that have NOT been sent

inputs.tooltip: Select all applications that have NOT been printed.

inputs.name: inpId
inputs.style: display: flex;margin: auto;font-size: 18px;border: solid black 1px;border-radius: 5px;height: 45px;width: 180px;font-weight: 600
inputs.tooltip: Select an application by entering the entire app id or return all applcations which which contain the number entered as you add digits

inputs.name: inGuardian
inputs.style: display: flex;margin: auto;font-size: 18px;border: solid black 1px;border-radius: 5pxw;width: 225px;height: 45px;font-weight: 600
inputs.tooltip: Select an application by entering the guardian first or last name.  Multiple rows will be returned if mutliple matches are found
